title: I am lagging in a way I've never seen before
body: All units move super slowly on my screen and randomly teleport. Interactions with other units cause instant teleportation. Most attack/ability animations are inconsistent with movement, and for the most part it acts like I might expect if I were playing with 20 fps and 500 ping. The shocking part, is I'm playing with about 200 fps and 50 ping. If someone can explain, that'd be great. Thank you.

replies.body: It sounds like you're getting packet loss, are you on wi-fi?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) when you get a chance to let us know for sure.  If there is packet loss see if[ configuring your dns](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), [power cycling](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic), or a wired connection can help. Test it in a custom game, though!
I'd go more in-depth with a Riot Employee on this situation. Submit a ticket or live chat with them!
